reviews.name: Reese Towpower Hitch Class III/IV, 2" Box Opening, Model #44101
reviews.reviewText: fits great i did grind off ford rivets so it would fit flush cant beat the price and shipping thanks walmart 1986 ford ranger
reviews.title: great for ford ranger

reviews.name: Reese Towpower Hitch Class III/IV, 2" Box Opening, Model #44101
reviews.reviewText: The hitch was as expected. The holes were drilled in the right places and easily bolted on. Ii would recommend this product to anyone needing a hitch.
reviews.title: Great hitch for the money

reviews.name: Reese Towpower Hitch Class III/IV, 2" Box Opening, Model #44101
reviews.reviewText: Great hitch ,well built. I installed it by myself with no problems at all.
reviews.title: Ready in 30 minutes
